website_summaries.verdict: An affordable Moscow Mule set made from 100% copper that also comes with a copper shot glass.
pros: No stainless steel lining allows copper to interact with the elements of a Moscow Mule the way the drink was intended to be consumed
Works as a nice mug for many drinks
cons: Sometimes this product arrives with scratches or aging already started and will not be as shiny as the picture

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Moscow mule copper mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Copper mugs are extremely well made and a great price ( we have others we paid way more $ for). They were very well packaged, bubble wrap, tissue and bagged inside their box. Love the shape. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pure copper set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product 100% copper none of that steel lined crap This set also comes with cooper straws and a shot glass. An email from company was in my inbox checking on my order the day it came. Cheers !
customer_reviews.author: lesliegail22

customer_reviews.title: Quality Moscow Mule Mugs
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in beautiful shape. I am going to hang them on the wall with some other copper pieces. I'll be buying some ginger beer and some limes this weekend (have the vodka) and look forward to my first Moscow Mule. I'll refrigerate the mug. Can it go into the freezer? Advise. I want it super cold
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Rechner

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE. WILL CORRODE IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely not 100% copper. They are very thinly coated mugs, with god knows what as the main material. I bought these not for alcohol - but for drinking water, and that too purified water (Copper has great attributes cleansing and energies, etc.) Within 2 weeks, this is what's happened to the mugs (corrosion, the "copper" lining wearing off.) They're going straight into the garbage at this point.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Raggedy box and dented/scratched mugs
customer_reviews.text: Originally got these for a gift, but there’s no way I could gift to anyone without being embarrassed. Packaging looked old, worn and abused. Mugs look decent upon first site, but one was dinged on the bottom, one had scratches inside that look like they were from a metal straw, and one has some black specks (tarnish?). Either these were used, or they’re poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: H.R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and used.
customer_reviews.text: Update*** I ordered a replacement set and it was in worse shape than the first set. Needless to say, they we're returned and my search will continue for quality copper mugs. Received these mugs for a gift and they appear to be used, not new. The box they arrived in was damaged. All four mugs we're packaged/wrapped differently. The mugs have scratches and big dark spots inside of them and the straws arrived tarnished with sharp metal pieces sticking out on the ends. A straw shouldn't cut your mouth when you use it. Hopefully the next set I order (likely from another vendor) will actually be brand new and not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Cher H.

customer_reviews.title: Get theses ones
customer_reviews.text: Big hit at Christmas and a great price. IF you are looking for Moscow Mule cups look no further. They look and hold more then my sister-in-law's super expensive copper cups. And theses ones come with a big handle, which is nice for my big husband.
customer_reviews.author: C. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Copper Mugs cuz fancy looking
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and seems great. After first use and washing, I notice these specs inside. Try washing to see if they can be removed. Not sure if some kind of chemical reaction occurred and stained it, but the inside has these dark looking water marks that just never seem to go away. Its great for drinks, but just bothers me a bit when i see those darkened stains on the inside without knowing what causes it and why it cant be washed off.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Xmas 2019 gift. I don’t know how it will be in practice but unpacked it. It would seem to have all the specifications my son in law wants and it cost much less than any he’d seen. My impression is they are well made, comfortable to hold, a nice size and they look good. I’m confident he will love them but I’ll leave an update if they fall short!
customer_reviews.author: SJL49

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Moscow Mule Mug Set less than 2 week ago. The only thing I like is the handle easy to hold vs other mugs; however, don't buy these. The copper layer came off. It is not 100% copper. Like other reviews, they are bad. I would not recommended this. Will return this set soon.
customer_reviews.author: SLe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t plan on buying these if you’re married.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got this package, I have been the talk of the town. Women will not stop coming over to drink with me and I can’t even hold enough ice in my freezer to satisfy the demand of my ‘friends’. You will not regret how drunk you’ll get with these and how much you’ll forget!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fit the description
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality pure copper mug that was only copper on the inside, no lining. This met those qualifiers. Product was as described. The perfect size for a Moscow mule. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are very nicely made, keeps drinks cold, and makes anyone who drinks a Moscow Mule very happy. I wash by hand and they always look great! The copper straws and shot glass are just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking mule
customer_reviews.text: Looking for one that was 100% copper (unlike the ones with the cheap looking brass handles. Also like the hammered copper, rounded ones so these fit the bill. They look nice and the copper shot glass is a nice add. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: They are exactly as pictured and described. Can't wait ...
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as pictured and described. Can't wait to try them. I ordered 2 sets, but only received a shot glass in one of the sets. How do I go about getting another shot glass, as one of the sets is a present?
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Love the copper!
customer_reviews.text: I love these copper mugs! Great deal for the set!
customer_reviews.author: MBuck819

customer_reviews.title: I'm Satisfied with These
customer_reviews.text: Do I know much about copper mugs? No. Do I like to drink mules? Yes. Do these do the job, hell yes. No complaints from me, I've had them for a couple of weeks, starting to get a little tarnish, but its what I expect. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Imbibe with the right kinda mug.
customer_reviews.text: Drink your mule in style. Yes, you can still enjoy a Moscow Mule without a copper mug, but why? As my bartender friend says, It’s all about the presentation!”
customer_reviews.author: Karen McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Moscow Mule drink worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to write this review after being contacted by the company. They were understanding and helpful. Contacted me promptly and were glad to be of assistance. They care about their product and had replaced the damaged or tarnished mugs. Having a Moscow Mule is a copper mug makes all the difference and thanks to Moscow Mix. I can enjoy it anytime I want.
customer_reviews.author: Spcfoo

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make a Moscow mule at home after my husband enjoyed one out while traveling. The shape of the mug was very comfortable to drink from and the copper kept the drink very cold. Bought a second set for my son. Definitely would recommend this set of copper mules.
customer_reviews.author: DC HillerLaramie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mugs!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are exactly what we wanted! I searched many stores and only found this quality of mug for $22 to $25 dollars PER MUG! I was so happy to find this quality for such a great price. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Had my very first Moscow mule in this product! Now I take them with me to family get together and love entertaining with them! Also bought the copper straws!! WHAT???? Nice and cold for hot Florida!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, as described. Nice and big for LOTS of Moscow Mules.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. I love the style, and quality. These will look great entertaining by the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of mugs
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the gift set and price was lower than other similar sets. I was concerned about receiving this before Christmas so contacted the seller who shipped it immediately to ensure receipt before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Standard copper mugs. Im giving these as a gift so they haven't been used yet- Will revise review if they start to break down. Just a little bummed as one of them came with a dint in the bottom of it so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality over all
customer_reviews.text: A great buy and the shot glasses are pretty cool too. They look pretty awesome on the table with a darker wood. Some of the cups had a little bit of flaw to them. Not terrible, or something that would make them unusable, but around the lip of the cup you can see where the copper stretched and sometimes didn't evenly distribute. I bought 8, 2 out of 8 you could hardly see it. Overall though, they are great to drink out of and a beautiful piece on the table.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Bocek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mules!
customer_reviews.text: Love that is full copper inside and out. Most places it is copper on the outside and steel on the inside. The copper shot measurer was a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: Fmerch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product for a very reasonable price. Keeps drinks super cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Moscow Mule Copper Cups
customer_reviews.text: Well made and a good price. I gave them as a gift and we tried them out right away. Easy to hold and held the chill. Came in an attractive box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I have used them many times and they clean up great. Keep your drinks extra cool with ice. I love the copper shot glass that comes with the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice copper mug set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price, however, there was some discoloration on the inside of the glasses after only one use.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lenger

customer_reviews.title: Box was not in gift giving condition
customer_reviews.text: This product might be nice however the box came all banged up. I was going to use this for the “dice game” gift exchange however I may return it because it feels tacky giving a gift in messed up packaging. Downside of shopping online.
customer_reviews.author: Philosophy of Peace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Quality and good value, beautiful! Thinking about getting four more!
customer_reviews.author: Anita K Geisler

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these mugs for over 2 years. They didn't get faded, they have kept the same shiny look since day one! Would defiantly buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zweibohmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs --bought 2 sets - one for self, one for gift!! Keeps your drink ice ice cold! The handle is great/comfortable unlike other Moscow mule mugs I've used. Large compared to what you get in a restaurant - makes huge drinks. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, just disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were excited to get these mugs and use them. Upon receiving them, I opened them immediately. First of all the box looked like it had been opened before, or at least tossed around a bit. Second, at least 2 of the mugs are dented. One on the side, and 1 on the bottom. They also seem to me like they had been used? A little disappointed overall with the mugs we received.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for our wedding party as our gifts from the Bride and Groom. They arrived FAST and are so beautiful. Our wedding accent color is copper and we received so many compliments on them and our wedding party absolutely loved them. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son as a housewarming gift. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set except....
customer_reviews.text: One of the mugs came in deformed. It was a disappointment since this set was intended as a gift. Other than that the other three mugs look beautiful and the measuring cup is really cute and useful
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M.

customer_reviews.title: Urban Homes is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The high quality is very apparent with these mugs. I bought them for my mother since she loves Moscow Mules, and I'm pleased to say she loves them! This company, Urban Homes, has also been so on top of checking to make sure the product arrived safely. They have gone over and beyond and I couldn't be more pleased! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making Moscow Mules
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my husband, Moscow Mules are his favorite, and they work perfectly! Since they don't have the clear coat that some have it effects the taste in the way that the copper cup is meant to.
customer_reviews.author: KAH

customer_reviews.title: Two of the mugs have defect and no response from the seller regarding my request for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my daughter. We opened the box and used only two of the mugs, they were fine. However, a few weeks later we got the other two mugs out to use and noticed there is a discoloration on the inside and an odor, there is a defect around the rim on the other mug. I wrote to Urban Homes asking if they could please replace the two mugs but haven’t heard anything from them. I have photos to show them the defect but am still waiting for someone to even respond to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a friend who loves her Moscow mule, and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Working out perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these cups for a few months now. We have used them a lot and they are great. No complaints. They look really nice in person.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs...... not to mention at a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindylu

customer_reviews.title: Look good/Stain easily
customer_reviews.text: Problem is they stain very easily. You have to dry, dry, dry them AND then dry them again. Once stained, they are very hard to restore. Soak in heated white vinegar, salt and scrub with a sponge. Bright side they keep drink COLD!
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Copper mugs are great for Moscow Mules
customer_reviews.text: Keep drinks cold. Nice looking. Can't speak to durability since we just received them. 16oz capacity is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rayyardman

customer_reviews.title: Wish all 4 were as beautiful as the 2 are!
customer_reviews.text: 2 were perfect but 1 had pitting (hard to see in photo but I circled where) 4th just a bit marred on bottom and by handle. They are beautiful and we will just make sure to give guests the unmarred ones. Would not suggest as gift, tho, without shipping to yourself and checking first if you want 4 perfect mugs.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Unlined Copper Keeps COLD
customer_reviews.text: These mugs (and the shot glass) keep beverages COLD. That is a great thing for anything you take from the freezer or that is made with ice. I like the fact that they are unlined so you get the benefits of drinking from a copper vessel (supposed to be antiviral). You DO have to clean and dry them well to prevent tarnish, which they tell you about in the product description. They come in a nice box and are definitely giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea or for Personal Use
customer_reviews.text: These copper mugs really do keep your Moscow Mule drink cold! Amazing! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: GLenn

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Looks fantastic. Seller followed up to make sure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J. Mausolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for company
customer_reviews.text: I've really liked the variant mules I've tried, but in mixing them for company I've not had the proper copper cups. This set was perfect for my needs, both functional and lovely to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass McFerran

customer_reviews.title: Nice mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no issues and product arrived within the time frame.
customer_reviews.author: mlh1013

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality item
customer_reviews.text: Love our new copper mugs. Recently introduced to the "Moscow Mule" I was told I'm not doing it right unless I have copper mugs. Found these on Amazon. They were shipped very quickly and we are now enjoying them. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: It works great for all summer drinks in addition to Moscow and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second set. It works great for all summer drinks in addition to Moscow and Kentucky mules.
customer_reviews.author: Susan KP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful copper mule mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set to take on vacation and have not used them yet, but they arrived in great condition, very well packed and look beautiful. Looking forward to enjoying our citrus mules at the beach!! Also appreciated the shot glass, nice addition to the order
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E Kleinbach

customer_reviews.title: Did I pay for used mugs!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift. The box was damaged and looked like it was something that had been returned. The mugs are scratched and discolored in a couple spots, like they have been used. Also smells like they have been in somebody’s basement. I’m disappointed that they were shipped this way. Other than that, the seem to be ok. I do not have time to reorder so I will try to shine them up and put them in a basket as I would be too embarrassed to give them in the box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: questionable copper
customer_reviews.text: out all 4 of them the inside mug kept it copper sheen one did not completely discolored like a gray copper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Haven’t used yet, but looks beautiful! Great follow up from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Authentic REAL copper!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of mugs, feels very good in the hand and makes my Moscow mule tastes so much better and authentic!
customer_reviews.author: Dragooi

customer_reviews.title: Changed rating
customer_reviews.text: 100% copper mugs should not be consumed from if acidic product. Contacted by Manufacturer told food grade copper. FDA approved! Due love these mugs. Happy now that I know they are safe!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: Great Mugs for Moscow Mules. Keeps the drinks very cold and I feel super fancy using them at parties. Will be ordering more for more guests to drink out of
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, cold copper mugs!!
customer_reviews.text: The shot glass that was advertised as part of the package was not included when my daughter opened the box. Other than that the mugs were very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are nice looking but I am very disappointed in the quality. After a late night get together 2 of the mugs were left with a little bit of alcohol in them overnight. They both oxided and discolored the inside mug. I used online remedies to clean them which was unsuccessful. So now they look horrible and have a metal smell to them. I wish I didn’t throw out the box because I would definitely be returning them!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Looks regifted and I just bought it
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these “brand new” and was planning on gifting them this Christmas.. which I’m still going to do.. the cups are fine! They are what I expected however the packing was already opened..you can tell someone ripped it open already and all the corners look beat up and box has some scratches all over it.. so the packaging is really bad and even though I just bought it.. this gift looks regifted if ya know what I mean
customer_reviews.author: R2d2mack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Made just like it should be. Could not be happier. First use was to make a Moscow Mule. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: james m smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Serviceable Moscow Mule Mugs
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift and she very much LOVED it. The appearance and durability are two of the factors she has enjoyed since receiving it. They arrived is great shape and the receiver was ecstatic!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sale

customer_reviews.title: Good mugs, but copper straws not included.
customer_reviews.text: These mugs tarnish easily but I expected that. What I wasn't aware of when I purchased these is that they don't come with the copper straws. Almost every other copper mug on Amazon seems to come with the straws. Dang.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful High Maintenance Cups
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these cups in the beginning but after a use or two the lining of the cups seems to be eroding or is extremely tarnished. I read all these reviews thinking this cup would be amazing but whenever I wash it I make sure to wipe it down since water seems to tarnish the cup. Too bad! These cups were extremely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect - one draw back is they cannot go in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Kim cardamone

customer_reviews.title: They showed up and i gave them to the lady ...
customer_reviews.text: They showed up and i gave them to the lady that i order them for she loves them. Thanks JB
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pour it up, pour it up.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Go slow once you get your drink poured into them though. I was over excited and got myself on my front tooth but it wasn’t the cups fault that I’m clumsy. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: cbaldwin

customer_reviews.title: We had a great time drinking our Kentucky mules out of these when ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with the quality of these mugs. We had a great time drinking our Kentucky mules out of these when they arrived. Drinks stayed ice cold longer than in a glass mug and seemed to be more refreshing. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jeff nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love these mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these mugs as a gift and the recipient loved them. They have the traditional Moscow Mule look and came with straws and a shot glass. Good purchase. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are as just what I hoped for. They look beautiful on my buffet and keep your drink ice clod.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four have discolored so quality may be lacking. But, work well for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC O.

customer_reviews.title: Several scuffed and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like these mugs. They're a good size, I like the shape, and they get the job done. Unfortunately, mine came scuffed up and with small scratches on several. Not bad enough to really cause any problems, but still a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Cait K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these mugs! Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Love these mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and made my sister so happy to receive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cups are fine but no shot glass
customer_reviews.text: Advertised to come with shot cup but that was not in my package. Even so, the cups are fine and I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: personal_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality (damaged and very light)
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed - 2 of 4 glasses were damaged, no measure included in the packaging. Never buying this one again
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Agrawal

customer_reviews.title: The mugs are of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It got here quickly. The mugs are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy mugs and shot glass. Fully made with Copper so I also purchased copper cleaner which has worked great! Makes a super cold Moscow mile and looks authentic! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rania A Habib

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for the "RV" - exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: JRR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mugs!
customer_reviews.text: These mule mugs are just as advertised- solid and beautiful. The jigger is a nice addition. I only got 4- probably should have done 8 for family gatherings 😉 I also received great follow up after the purchase- a rarity these days.
customer_reviews.author: William Lucht

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like these. Got one set and and the handle had dents on one mug and poor welding on another. Returned and replaced the set and one of the new mugs had scrapes on it and some poor welding. These come in gift boxes. Thankfully, I was not giving these as gifts because I would have been completely embarassed. Poor quality control from their vendor.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 sets of these for gifts and for myself. I love the look and craftsmanship of these copper mugs. They are prefect gift! My in-laws loved them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs for Moscow Mules! The handles are comfortable compared to other mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Bibik

customer_reviews.title: I like the cups however
customer_reviews.text: I like the cups however, the ends of the cup handles were bent and hammered flat before being welded to the sides of the cups as opposed the ends being directly welded without a bent flat piece like shown in the pictures. Not quite as nice, in my opinion, but something I can live with. Especially, considering the price was half of what my wife paid on-line for other ones that looked the same.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and it was well received
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great cups
customer_reviews.text: Cups came well packaged, they are light and have great handles
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Quintero

customer_reviews.title: 100% Copper Mug, great for chilled drinks
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find these mugs, don't settle for anything less! Must have the 100% copper for the "Moscow Mule Drink" to taste the best. Handle comfortable for holding the chilled drink!
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but the shot glass is sharp
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the shot glass doesn't have a rounded edge. I cut my finger on the edge while washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Vanhorne

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They keep the mules so chilly. They look great but I can’t attest to their durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: hol920

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs
customer_reviews.text: This was a well received gift! They were immediately washed and mules served. :)
customer_reviews.author: BJSaber

customer_reviews.title: beautiful mugs
customer_reviews.text: These moscow mule mugs are exactly what we were looking for. They're beautiful, easy to care for, and they keep the drinks really cold while you enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look snazzy
customer_reviews.text: These beautiful copper mugs came quickly and in great shape! They look well made and durable, can't wait to have my friends over for a Moscow mule👍
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.text: I gave them as a gift and he loved it..

product_meta.title: Moscow Mule Copper Mugs with 4 Straws and Shot Glass - Set of 4 HandCrafted Food Safe Pure Solid Copper Mugs - Bonus Highest Quality Copper Shot Glass and 4 Copper Straws - Attractive Box
feature_bullets: ✓ 100% AUTHENTIC FOOD GRADE COPPER MUGS - Moscow-Mix Moscow Mule Copper Mugs are made of 100% Food Safe Pure Copper. Just like the Authentic Moscow Mule Mugs. Each copper mug went through a comprehensive third-party safety and quality testing to ensure it is food safe because we want you to enjoy it without any worries.
✓ BONUS: 4 COPPER STRAWS & COPPER SHOT GLASS - With each set of 4 Copper Mule Mugs get 4 Pure Copper Drinking Straws and 1 Copper Shot Glass Bonus. Enjoy the Complete Moscow Mule Set.
✓ GIFT BOX PACKAGING - Are you buying this set as a GIFT?? Buy this Right Now because this Set of Copper Mugs comes in a GIFT BOX Packaging. So no worry about the Gift Packaging, We got your back.

✓ IMPRESSIVE HANDCRAFTING - NO TWO ARE THE SAME: You already know proper handcrafted Moscow Mule Mugs are as stunning as they are functional. Enjoy your 100% authentic Mule Cups with a polish finish, you deserve this drinking glasses kit.

✓ 16 OZ CAPACITY COPPER MUGS WITH NUMEROUS USES - Imagine you sipping chilled beers, iced teas, frosted cocktails and water in your new 100% Pure Copper Moscow Mule Mug. The generous 16 oz sized copper mug is perfect to hold your drink and ice cubes without worrying about spills. Our copper mugs feature a smooth lip with a securely welded handle for comfort and durability. These Moscow Mule Copper Mugs are easy to clean and beautiful accessories to store.
